statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerType , AA.CustomerName , AA.EngName , AA.BizID , AA.AddressID
, BB.BizNo , BB.RepName
FROM dbo.BMCustomer AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.LMBusiness BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BizID = BB.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.CustomerName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.EngName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerType , AA.CustomerName , AA.EngName , AA.BizID , AA.AddressID
, BB.BizNo , BB.BizName , BB.RepName , BB.BizType , BB.BizItem , BB.AddressID , BB.TaxType
, B1.PostalCode , B1.City , B1.StateProvince , B1.Country , B1.AddressLine1 , B1.AddressLine2
, CC.PostalCode , CC.City , CC.StateProvince , CC.Country , CC.AddressLine1 , CC.AddressLine2
FROM dbo.BMCustomer AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.LMBusiness BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BizID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LMAddress B1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON BB.AddressID = B1.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LMAddress CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AddressID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMCustomer ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, CustomerType, CustomerName, EngName, BizID, AddressID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #CustomerType#, #CustomerName#, #EngName#, #BizID#, #AddressID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMCustomer SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, CustomerType = #CustomerType# , CustomerName = #CustomerName# , EngName = #EngName# , BizID = #BizID# , AddressID = #AddressID# WHERE ID = #ID#
